alert.note: Alert for Putnam; Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 07 at 9:30PM EST until March 07 at 10:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM EST FOR CENTRAL FAIRFIELD...NORTHERN WESTCHESTER AND PUTNAM COUNTIES... At 928 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mahopac, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. This severe storm will be near... Brewster around 935 PM EST. Ridgefield and Bethel around 945 PM EST. Wilton and Weston around 950 PM EST. Monroe around 1000 PM EST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
